title: Stage S12
description: Level 1 grammar practice focusing on stage-specific patterns and expressions.
learning_points: Level 1 target grammar and expressions with practical usage examples

sentences.en: My birthday is in March.
Let's meet on Friday.
The class starts at 9 o'clock.
I was born in 1990.
We have a meeting on Monday.
The store opens at 10 AM.
I study from 7 to 9 PM.
Christmas is in December.
The party is on Saturday night.
I wake up at 6:30 every day.
My birthday is in March.
Let's meet on Friday.
The class starts at 9 o'clock.
I was born in 1990.
We have a meeting on Monday.
The store opens at 10 AM.
I study from 7 to 9 PM.
Christmas is in December.
The party is on Saturday night.
I wake up at 6:30 every day.

sentences.kr: 어제 본 영화가 정말 대단했어요. (목적격 생략)
sentences.en: The movie I watched yesterday was amazing.
The book which you recommended is interesting.

sentences.kr: 제가 다니는 회사는 매우 커요. (전치사 뒤로)
sentences.en: The company I work for is very large.
The company for which I work is very large.
The house we lived in was small.

sentences.kr: 제가 대화한 사람은 매우 도움이 되었어요.
sentences.en: The person who I talked to was very helpful.

sentences.kr: 제가 여기 온 이유는 중요해요. (이유 생략)
sentences.en: The reason I came here is important.

sentences.kr: 그녀가 말하는 방식은 매우 명확해요. (방법 관계절)
sentences.en: The way she speaks is very clear.

sentences.kr: 우리가 만난 날은 잊을 수 없었어요. (시간 생략)
sentences.en: The day we met was unforgettable.

sentences.kr: 우리가 처음 만난 장소는 저에게 특별해요.
sentences.en: The place where we first met is special to me.
